option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Minimal .env created by assistant APP_ENV=dev APP_DEBUG=1 # Generate a random secret: bin/console secrets:generate-keys or use any random string APP_SECRET=ChangeMePlease1234567890
# Local sqlite example - adjust if you use MySQL/Postgres # Use sqlite for quick local boot without DB setup DATABASE_URL="sqlite:///%kernel.project_dir%/var/data.db"
# Mailer - adjust to your SMTP or null transport MAILER_DSN=null://null
# Optional: file upload temp dir UPLOADS_DIR=public/uploads
